title: Successful User Registration
steps_actions:
1. "Launch the application"
2. "Tap on \"Don't have an account? Sign Up\""
3. "Enter valid phone number with country code (e.g., +998901234567)"
4. "Enter valid username (minimum 2 characters)"
5. "Enter valid password (minimum 6 characters)"
6. "Tap \"Sign Up\" button"
steps_result:
1. "App loads with authentication screen displayed"
2. "Registration form is displayed with username, phone, password fields"
3. "Phone number is accepted and formatted correctly"
4. "Username is accepted without validation errors"
5. "Password is accepted without validation errors"
6. "User account is created successfully and redirected to main menu"

title: Successful User Login
steps_actions:
1. "Launch the application"
2. "Enter registered phone number"
3. "Enter correct password"
4. "Tap \"Login\" button"
steps_result:
1. "Authentication screen is displayed"
2. "Phone number is accepted"
3. "Password is accepted"
4. "User is authenticated and redirected to main menu"

title: Login with invalid credentials
steps_actions:
1. "Launch the application"
2. "Enter unregistered phone number"
3. "Enter any password"
4. "Tap \"Login\" button"
steps_result:
1. "Authentication screen is displayed"
2. "Phone number is accepted"
3. "Password is accepted"
4. "Error message \"Authentication failed\" is displayed"

title: Registration with weak password
steps_actions:
1. "Navigate to registration screen"
2. "Enter valid phone number"
3. "Enter valid username"
4. "Enter password with less than 6 characters"
5. "Tap \"Sign Up\" button"
steps_result:
1. "Registration form is displayed"
2. "Phone number is accepted"
3. "Username is accepted"
4. "Password is entered"
5. "Validation error \"Password must be at least 6 characters\" is displayed"

title: Registration with short username
steps_actions:
1. "Navigate to registration screen"
2. "Enter valid phone number"
3. "Enter username with less than 2 characters"
4. "Enter valid password"
5. "Tap \"Sign Up\" button"
steps_result:
1. "Registration form is displayed"
2. "Phone number is accepted"
3. "Username is entered"
4. "Password is accepted"
5. "Validation error \"Enter a valid username\" is displayed"

title: Registration with empty fields
steps_actions:
1. "Navigate to registration screen"
2. "Leave all fields empty"
3. "Tap \"Sign Up\" button"
steps_result:
1. "Registration form is displayed"
2. "All fields remain empty"
3. "Validation errors are displayed for all required fields"

title: Phone number format validation
steps_actions:
1. "Navigate to registration\/login screen"
2. "Enter invalid phone number format"
3. "Enter password"
4. "Tap submit button"
steps_result:
1. "Form is displayed"
2. "Invalid phone is entered"
3. "Password is entered"
4. "Phone field validation error is displayed"

title: Toggle between login and registration
steps_actions:
1. "Launch application"
2. "Tap \"Don't have an account? Sign Up\""
3. "Tap \"Already have an account? Login\""
4. "Verify form fields change appropriately"
steps_result:
1. "Authentication screen is displayed"
2. "Registration form appears with username field"
3. "Login form appears without username field"
4. "UI switches between modes correctly"

title: Order Creation Flow
steps_actions:
1. "Navigate to order creation screen"
2. "Select location using \"Current Location\" button"
3. "Enter apartment number"
4. "Enter floor number"
5. "Enter entrance number"
6. "Select trash type from dropdown"
7. "Select package quantity"
8. "Select pickup date"
9. "Select pickup time"
10. "Enter additional notes"
11. "Tap \"Schedule Pickup\" button"
steps_result:
1. "Order creation form is displayed"
2. "Current location is detected and displayed"
3. "Apartment number is entered"
4. "Floor number is entered"
5. "Entrance number is entered"
6. "Trash type is selected"
7. "Quantity is selected"
8. "Date is selected"
9. "Time is selected"
10. "Notes are entered"
11. "Order is created successfully and user returns to main menu"

3. "Validation error \"Please fill all required fields\" is displayed"
